com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.driver

Class SeleniumWComponentsWebDriverFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.driver.SeleniumWComponentsWebDriverFactory

  • public final class SeleniumWComponentsWebDriverFactory
extends Object
    Convenience class to provide factory methods for getting new instances of WComponentsWebDriver.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Joshua Barclay

    • Method Detail

      • createDriver

        public static <T extends org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver> SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver<T> createDriver(T backingDriver)
        Create a SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver backed by the given WebDriver.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the Selenium WebDriver.
        Parameters:
        backingDriver - the WebDriver implementation.
        Returns:
        a SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver wrapping the given backing driver.

      • createDriver

        public static <T extends org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver> SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver<T> createDriver(WebDriverType<T> backingDriverType)
        Create a SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver backed by the driver implementation of the given WebDriverType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the Selenium WebDriver.
        Parameters:
        backingDriverType - the WebDriverType that references the backing WebDriver to wrap.
        Returns:
        a SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver wrapping the given backing driver.

      • createDriver

        public static <T extends org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver> SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver<T> createDriver(String backingDriverClass)

        Create a SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver backed by the an instance of the given backingDriverClass class name.

        WARNING: As reflection is used to instantiate the WebDriver, the type T may be unreliable if not used correctly.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the Selenium WebDriver.
        Parameters:
        backingDriverClass - the full class name of the WebDriver implementation.
        Returns:
        a SeleniumWComponentsWebDriver wrapping the given backing driver.

      • createBackingDriver

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createBackingDriver(String backingDriverClass)
        Create a WebDriver implementation from a String class name.
        Parameters:
        backingDriverClass - the WebDriver implementation class.
        Returns:
        the WebDriver implementation.
